code: import{shopActionType}from"./shop.type";import{firestore,convertCollectionSnapshotToMap}from"../../firebase/firebase.utils";export var fetchCollectionStart=function fetchCollectionStart(){return{type:shopActionType.FETCH_COLLECTION_START};};export var fetchCollectionSuccess=function fetchCollectionSuccess(collection){return{type:shopActionType.FETCH_COLLECTION_SUCCESS,payload:collection};};export var fetchCollectionFailure=function fetchCollectionFailure(errorMessage){return{type:shopActionType.FETCH_COLLECTION_FAILURE,payload:errorMessage};};export var fetchCollectionStartAsync=function fetchCollectionStartAsync(){return function(dispatch){dispatch(fetchCollectionStart());var collectionRef=firestore.collection("collection");collectionRef.get().then(function(snapshot){var collectionObject=convertCollectionSnapshotToMap(snapshot);dispatch(fetchCollectionSuccess(collectionObject));}).catch(function(error){return dispatch(fetchCollectionFailure(error.message));});};};export var checkCollections=function checkCollections(){return{type:shopActionType.CHECK_COLLECTION};};
